QuestData.Title: The Eternal Palace: Queen's Gambit
QuestData.Description: The way is clear. The palace awaits, $n.$b$bWithin the Vainglorious holds court with an old god. Defeating her will be no small feat. $b$bMake no mistake, Azshara is one of the most powerful sorceresses alive. We cannot underestimate her power or her planning, for she has had thousands of years to prepare for us. Nevertheless, she must be defeated.$b$bWe are ready when you are. Shall we finally accept her invitation?
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Queen Azshara in the Eternal Palace.
